cast.name: 特拉维斯·米尔斯 Travis Mills
韦德·埃弗里特 Wade Everett

writer.name: 特拉维斯·米尔斯 Travis Mills

director.name: 特拉维斯·米尔斯 Travis Mills

this_title: The Woman Who Robbed the Stagecoach
introduction: One of 12 Westerns made in 12 months during 2020, this film tells the true story of Pearl Hart, played by Lorraine Etchell, a woman who goes through a series of bad relationships with men, eventually turning to a life of crime with a European drifter named Joe Boot (Travis Mills). Together they decide to rob a stagecoach, leading Pearl to be one of the most famous female outlaws of all time.
foreign_title: The Woman Who Robbed the Stagecoach
